sample_docs: Ten Reasons Why End Users Should Choose VertX CS Access Control Ten Reasons Why Wholesale Central Stations Should Monitor VertX CS Access Control VertX CS How To Order Guide VertX V1000 Wiring Diagram VertX V2000 Wiring Diagram Ten Reasons Why Proprietary Central Stations Should Choose VertX CS Access Control Ten Reasons Why Dealers With Central Stations Should Choose VertX CS Access Control Ten Reasons Why Installers/Integrators Should Install VertX CS Access Control VertX CS Feature Summary GNU General Public License Central Station Managed Access Control When deployed with central station alarm monitoring software from HID's development partners DICE, GE MAS, or Bold Technologies, VertX CS provides a fully featured access control system capability developed specifically for alarm services customers. VertX CS was developed specifically for the central station market in collaboration with industry leading central station automation software developers. Bold Technologies Ltd. Poised to address current threats and committed to meeting all future government requirements, HID Global's Government Team is a dedicated group of specialists devoted to providing products that allow agencies to meet their directives. Our experience in working with government organizations provides HID Global with a strong foundation for understanding their unique security needs. HID products operate securely, 24/7/365. Government end-users can be assured that their facilities and networks are protected by ... more Financial Guarding against the ever-present danger of security breaches that could harm both personnel and invaluable IT networks is a primary concern for leaders in the financial services industry. The first step in protecting people and information is controlling physical access to offices and buildings through authorized credential checkpoints. Delivering multiple layers of protection, a system may have to account for employees, visitors and other tenants. A security solution may have to be operational 24/7/365 and ... more Health Care With multiple hospital sites, thousands of physicians on medical staffs and numerous employees, health groups are organizations that have high needs for access control, information management and facility management systems. Within the last decade, a heightened awareness of patient privacy, medical records (HIPPA) and controlled access has necessitated a complete re-evaluation of facility management. Health care industry leaders turn to HID to enhance facility security by controlling access to secure areas like nurseries, pharmacies and ... more Airports / Ports Endeavoring to prevent terrorist attacks and protect the global transportation network, airport and transportation security must be vigilant, effective and efficient. HID Globals access control products are in use at many of the worlds busiest international ports. Every port and transportation facility has a unique set of requirements, from the use of multiple types of credentials on one reader to readers that are designed to match the level of security risk, adding PIN and ... more Education Educational institutions are faced with a unique set of security challenges. Schools must manage operational costs while enhancing security in the midst of increasing threats. In addition, campus environments are rich with diverse applications, requiring flexible system architectures to satisfy them. HID Global solutions help simplify physical and electronic security management for students, faculty and staff with cutting edge contactless smart card technology. After years of deferred maintenance and increasing enrollments, many schools are recognizing ... more Retail To influence a customer's shopping experience while simultaneously controlling costs, leading retailers demand the ability to regulate conditions. They are often directly involved in the design and operation of their facilities, focusing on brand experience and service delivery. Retailers fight a daily battle for innovation, delivery and share of the customer's mind. Faced with the consolidation of key retail channels, extended hours and additional amenity offerings to serve the needs of their customers, retailers ... more e-Goverment HID Global works with government ministries, state printers and system integrators to provide the critical components of e-Government systems. First, we produce secure credentials with embedded secure contactless technology and visual security elements designed to deter counterfeiting. Second, we provide the document readers that retrieve the information stored in e-documents for on-the-spot identity verification. And finally, we support e-Government programs with consulting, design assistance and training services. From proximity cards to multifunction smart cards, todays ID cards do far more than simply present a name and face. They conduct financial transactions, access networks and provide secure records management. Worldwide, organizations of all sizes count on HID software to help them streamline their operations, improve efficiency and increase security.

iCLASS smart cards and readers make access control more powerful, more versatile, and most important of all, offers enhanced security through encryption and mutual authentication. At the same time, iCLASS is user-friendly, delivering the convenience, affordability and reliability of proximity technology for which HID is known worldwide. ... more HID FlexSmart® MIFARE® and DESFire® Contactless Smart Card Readers are completely compatible with the requirements of ISO 14443A and are a perfect choice for access control, data storage solutions and multiple applications.
